name: "Bugs in, sludge out": Production circuits as composable game loop
description: We present This Cursed Machine, a sci fi body horror fulfillment center simulator where players produce materials by connecting together a variety of machines. By constructing a graph of transformations, we introduce a digital physics built on composable logic.

speakers.name: Agnes Cameron
speakers.bio: Agnes is a hardware and software engineer and artist based in London, UK. Much of her work explores forms of distributed intelligence and co-operation. She works as a lecturer and specialist technician at University of the Arts London's Creative Computing Institute, and as a technical consultant to artists, game design studios and innovation researchers.
